title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added new guide on using immutable releases and tags for GitHub Actions release management.
Updated existing actions release documentation to reference the new guide and revised tag management steps.
Added OAuth Apps rate limit warning (2000 token requests/hour) to prevent outages.
Removed "permanently" from repository visibility change warnings about stars and watchers.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
